name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 096
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, NFTs Are A Scam. Let all the ignorant people continue to say that now while we all stack valuable art for the future!
